name: radioactivity_concentration_of_234Th_in_air
description: "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "Radioactivity concentration" means radioactivity per unit volume of the medium. "Th" means the element "thorium" and "234Th" is the isotope "thorium-234" with a half-life of 2.41e+01 days.
